column5: Are you looking for a specialist degree that will prepare you for a high-octane career as a trader or investment manager?You’ll need a cool head, great communication skills and an analytical mind to get ahead in the competitive world of investment management. Not only will you have to read the financial markets, you need to build long-term business relationships, as well as being decisive and confident.The Investment Management course at Swansea University is our flagship programme focusing on finance and investment management and you will gain an advanced understanding of managing assets and risk in complex organisations.This advanced programme in Investment Management is for students who have already studied accounting and/ or finance, at undergraduate level.
